employee_external_id.notes: Map to Workday employee ID from timeOffEntries.employee.id field. The worker requesting the paid time off.

absence_type_external_id.notes: Map to Workday time off type ID from timeOffEntries.timeOff.id field. The Time Off for this time off entry requested (e.g., Vacation Time Off for Salaried Employees).

status.notes: Map to Workday time off entry status from timeOffEntries.status.id field. Status of the time off entry.

start_date.notes: Map to Workday start date from timeOffEntries.startDate field. Date when the time off begins.

end_date.notes: Map to Workday end date from timeOffEntries.endDate field. Date when the time off ends.

start_half_day.notes: Map to Workday start half day flag from timeOffEntries.startHalfDay field. Indicates if the time off starts at midday.

end_half_day.notes: Map to Workday end half day flag from timeOffEntries.endHalfDay field. Indicates if the time off ends at midday.

amount.notes: Map to Workday amount from timeOffEntries.amount field. Numeric quantity of requested time off.

unit.notes: Map to Workday unit of time from timeOffEntries.unitOfTime.id field. This is the unit of time (hours or days) associated with the time off for this time off entry.

employee_note.notes: Map to Workday note from timeOffEntries.note field. Free-text reason/details supplied by employee.

processing_context: Workday Common API v1 - Time Off Entries Management. Key endpoints: /workers/{ID}/timeOffEntries, /workers/{ID}/timeOffPlans. Primary schema: timeOffEntries_436f2afb755f100012528fa3260e000f
